alert.note: Alert for George (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 17 at 5:13PM CDT until June 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama and southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in southwest Alabama, Mobile. In southeast Mississippi, George. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Midtown Mobile, Tillmans Corner, Theodore, Grand Bay, Lucedale, Bayou La Batre, Dauphin Island, Tanner Williams, Semmes, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I10 And I65, Coden, Alabama Port, Seven Hills, Dees, Dawes, Meadow Lake, Saint Elmo and Irvington.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
